name: NobelCom
tag_list: phone-cards, calling-cards, prepaid-phone-cards, prepaid-calling-cards, online-phone-cards, online-calling-cards, international-phone-cards, international-calling-cards
overview:
NobelCom.com is the first retail website launched by Nobel, Ltd. Founded in 1998 by Thomas Knobel, Nobel, Ltd. is a market leader in the global telecommunications industry. Nobel, Ltd. has grown from pioneering online prepaid phone cards with NobelCom.com to offering an array of telecommunications services.

NobelCom provides online customers with a secure way to purchase affordable, easy-to-use prepaid phone cards.

Prepaid phone cards are an excellent solution for affordable long-distance calling without changing an existing phone provider. In addition, NobelCom products are rechargeable online. Customer satisfaction is the highest priority at NobelCom. We are one of the few phone cards websites to offer live customer support 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
